item.description:
For those of you in the Cambridge area who may want to attend a movie at the Kendall with an early dinner at The Blue Room nearby, I am scheduling a similar event to Diana's. There are many great movies at the Kendall so, it is your choice as to which you see but am thinking we could all meet-up around the same time at The Blue Room for an early dinner after the movie(s). Somewhere around 6:00-6:30 should work for most of the late afternoon movies for a dinner meet-up.

Please RSVP and let me know what movie you plan to see so we would know if and when to expect you.
